title.rendered: GME TX3520S UHF CB RADIO 5 WATT REMOTE HEAD WITH SCANSUITE

content.rendered:
GME TX3520S UHF CB RADIO 5 WATT REMOTE HEAD WITH SCANSUITE

GME TX3520S UHF CB Radio 5 Watt Remote Head with ScanSuite available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Synonymous with quality and reliability, the TX3520S is one of the most advanced 5 Watt UHF CB radios of its kind.

Featuring GME’s market-leading digital scanning technology, ScanSuite™, and an impressive feature list that includes Digital Signal Processing (DSP), Advanced Signal Management, Dynamic Volume Control, and 19 additional receive-only channels.

The TX3520S also includes 5 Digit Selcall, CTCSS & DCS to minimise unwanted background noise and interruptions from other users.

The innovative Remote Head design allows full access to the radio’s controls and the ability to view the LCD display with the base unit mounted out of sight. The microphone can connect to either the front of the remote head or the rear of the base unit for obstruction-free use, ensuring years of reliable performance in the harshest working conditions.

Features;
  • Shallow remote head with user controls
  • ScanSuite
  • Advanced signal management
  • Digital signal processing
  • Wide/narrowband receive filters
  • Voice inversion scrambler
  • CTCSS and DCS
  • Selcall (5 Tone)
  • Memory channel quick select
  • Open and group scan mode
  • Selectable priority channel
  • Active channel transmit in scan
  • Rotary channel selector and volume control
  • Digital signal strength meter
  • External speaker socket
  • Front and rear microphone input
  • Die-cast chassis
  • Slide-in mounting cradle

CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
